data.name: Autocrusher: Bumper Cars
data.detailed_description:
Auto Crusher: Bumper Cars is a car destruction racing game inspired by the bumper car rides from amusement arcades and carnivals.
In this game players will feel the excitement of crashing into other vehicles, coupled with the use of several power ups and upgrades that make this game a fast paced thrilling ride for glory!

Collect Coins and badges to upgrade and improve the performance of your combat vehicle. Explore all the fun that this game has to offer in the many arenas of the fantasy world you immerse yourself into.

data.short_description: Auto Crusher: Bumper Cars is a car destruction racing game inspired by the bumper car rides from amusement arcades and carnivals. In this game players will feel the excitement of crashing into other vehicles, coupled with the use of several power ups and upgrades , making this game a race for glory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Memory, ATI HD5650 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
